When ideas and vision meet

Small teams, unique skills and innovation to realize your vision.

T3C promises to bridge our deep operation knowledge rooted in critical legacy systems with modern best of breed DevOps centric agile methodology on cloud. Count on us to assist you to navigate the agile and DevOps adaptation- from Consultative to Transformation and Implementation.

We focus on deliverables to achieve best results in a collaborative manner at high frequency.

DevOps Capabilities

Liberate performance and innovation from change. Rapidly.

DevOps

Our DevOps tools and methodologies emcompass the entire gamut of build, release, monitoring, testing, security validation and compliance very early in your project cycles. Mature your pipelines quickly in small iterative steps. We provide a holistic approach with resiliency baked in, security and test compliant in a fully automated mode.

Build DevSecOps into your pipeline from the start and not as an afterthought

  • Our AWS certified exports can fast track your journey
  • Get Security compliance metrics very early in your release cycle with Industry Standard guidelines

Continuous Integration

While bugs are imminent, finding and fixing them should be streamlined into a continouous process.

Automatically build artifacts and verify your build wilh minimal or no manual intervention. Catch bugs and non-compliance very early in your release cycle so you dont have to fight these issues in production.

Our expertise in this will help you:

    Intgrate frequently by enforcing the practice
    Solve issues and problems quickly

Continuous Delivery

Get assurance change is deployable at any time.

Ensure rigorous testing processes in multiple environments with ease with one-click deployments.

  • Automate Unit, Patform, Functional and security compliance test at every build.
  • Auto deployment to lower environments
  • Post deploy verification ensures production ready code always available and ready

Continous Deployment

Gain confidence to deploy anytime with near zero downtime.

Here are some things we can help you with:

  • Feature flagging
  • Dark Deployments

We can consult and provide improvement workshops.

Reliability Engineering

We engineer our systems for breakdown in lower environments so we don't experience them in production.

Gain confidence simulating complex 'what if' scenarios on systems that is put into production

identify weaknesses and remediate them before they manifest in system-wide, aberrant behaviors

We excel in these areas:

  • Identifying teady state behavior
  • Running real world experiments in Production
  • Automate, automate and automate. Make the system self healing through a robust process loop
  • Minimize the blast radius - Reduce effect and isolate the error to minimize impact to the entire system

Agile

Initiate and embrace change

SAFe methodologies

We synergize Lean and agile methodologies and integrated into our DevOps and Delivery pipelines. We are dedicated to providing the highest standard of the current processes to our clients.

In addition to all regular services, our specialities include:

  • Release Management Counsulting
  • Call or Contact Us to accelerate your journey

Scrum

We value our work and are committed to achieving the best outcome for each of our clients. We take the time necessary to make sure that all of your needs and expectations are met.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is our preferred cloud service. Out team brings a wide array of technologies and skillsets to bear in this space.

Core specialties include:

  • Release Management
  • Assessments

Cloud Expertise

Outlined for Business Outcomes
Drive innovation and accelerate your company's growth with our full spectrum of cloud services.

Migration

We help clients adopt a Cloud Migration of existing on-premises workloads. While all applications are not amenable for migration, we can assess best choices for reducing your TCO.

    Lift and Shift
    Hybrid adoption

Cloud Adoption

Geared more towards newer green field workloads, we can help design and implment a cloud first and AWS cloud native approach to fast track your business needs.

We follow in principle..

    Cloud agnostic and Cloud native implementations win opensource first
    Enhancements with best of breed tools and technologies
